subtitulo: Developer in Training (Fatec) | Python • C++ • PL/SQL • Git/GitHub • Oracle Database | Logic, Technical Support & Fluent English (TOEIC 945)
resumo: Developer transitioning into tech, currently pursuing a degree in Systems Analysis and Development at FATEC-RP. Fluent in English (TOEIC 945) with solid experience in technical support, customer service, and credit analysis. Hands-on with projects focused on logic, data structures, automation, and computer vision — applying Python, SQL, C++, Oracle DB, and OpenCV. I integrate Git/GitHub and agile methodologies for version control and project organization. My background with end-users, team management, and clear communication supports empathetic, value-driven tech solutions. Ready to grow and collaborate in teams that foster initiative, continuous learning, and purpose-driven impact.
formacao: Technology Degree in Systems Analysis and Development – FATEC-RP (2022–2025)

Maintained internal databases using spreadsheets and enterprise systems.
Developed commercial partnerships and led consultative insurance sales.

projetos.name: Perceptron & MLP – Neural Network Fundamentals in Action
projetos.description: Implements a simple Perceptron from scratch and applies a Multilayer Perceptron (MLP) on synthetic and real datasets. Includes hyperparameter tuning and evaluation with scikit-learn.

projetos.name: Strategic ML Pipeline for Real Campaign Data
projetos.description: Executes a full pipeline combining clustering and supervised classification on the 'Marketing Campaign' dataset. Covers preprocessing, PCA, K-Means, pseudo-labeling, and logistic regression.

projetos.nome: Titanic Survival Classifier – Machine Learning with Scikit-learn
projetos.descricao: Supervised model predicting passenger survival using the Titanic Dataset

projetos.nome: Digital Image Processing – Segmentation with OpenCV + Matplotlib
projetos.descricao: Applied key techniques for real-world image manipulation and visualization

projetos.nome: RSA Cryptosystem with Modular Arithmetic – Cryptography in Python
projetos.descricao: Implemented RSA algorithm and encryption logic using modular arithmetic with public/private key generation

projetos.name: Vehicle Load Optimization – Integer Programming with Logistics Constraints
projetos.description: Solves a constrained loading problem using Integer Linear Programming in Python with Gurobi. Considers vehicle weight limit, item value and quantity, and incompatibility pairs to maximize total cargo value.

projetos.nome: Workforce Optimization – Linear Programming with Python + Gurobi
projetos.descricao: Designed models to optimize shift schedules and reduce payroll costs across scenarios

projetos.name: Study Planner Web App with NiceGUI
projetos.description: Responsive and intuitive web application developed in Python using NiceGUI. Helps users create personalized study plans through calendar and weekly scheduling. Features include user authentication, dashboard with usage metrics, data import/export, and cloud integration via Firebase Firestore.

projetos.name: Personal Finance Management App — Flutter + Firebase
projetos.description: Cross-platform mobile app built with Flutter and integrated with Firebase for real-time personal financial control. Allows users to log income and expenses, view consolidated balance, organize monthly spreadsheets, and access detailed reports. Features secure authentication, dynamic updates, and modular architecture with dedicated screens for login, entries, and visualizations.
